Name: Aditi Jain

{{item}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Directives_Assignment'; isHide = false; count=0; logclick:number[]=[]; toggle(){ this.isHide=!this.isHide; this.count+=1; this.logclick.push(this.count); } getBackgroundcolor(){ if(this.count>=5) { return 'blue'; }else return 'white'; } getFontcolor() { if(this.count>=5) { return 'white'; }else return 'black'; } }
